examples.example: 我们要不断努力学习，积累丰富的知识来充实自己。

translate.english: We should keep working hard to study and accumulate rich knowledge to enrich ourselves.

examples.example: 我们通过阅读大量书籍来获取丰富的知识，开拓自己的视野。

translate.english: We obtain rich knowledge and broaden our horizons by reading a large number of books.

examples.example: 拥有丰富知识的他，总是能轻松解决各种难题。

translate.english: With rich knowledge, he can always easily solve all kinds of difficult problems.
